trans-unit.source: We were unable to sign you in at this time, this could be due to an incorrect username/password, or your account has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: We were unable to sign you in at this time, this could be due to an incorrect username/password, or your account has been disabled.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem updating this item, please try again later.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem updating this item, please try again later.

trans-unit.source: No connection settings, tap to set
trans-unit.target: No connection settings, tap to set

trans-unit.source: Sorry, your hostname is invalid, please make sure you don't have any spaces (for example) in it.
trans-unit.target: Sorry, your hostname is invalid, please make sure you don't have any spaces (for example) in it.

trans-unit.source: Unable to get the trailer information
trans-unit.target: Unable to get the trailer information

trans-unit.source: Sorry, it looks like this account has been disabled. We will now take you back to the login screen.
trans-unit.target: Sorry, it looks like this account has been disabled. We will now take you back to the login screen.

trans-unit.source: No connection details have been set, would you like to set them now?
trans-unit.target: No connection details have been set, would you like to set them now?

trans-unit.source: Connection details are invalid, please try again.
trans-unit.target: Connection details are invalid, please try again.

trans-unit.source: Playing this type of video is currently experimental, results may vary, do you wish to continue?
trans-unit.target: Playing this type of video is currently experimental, results may vary, do you wish to continue?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you wish to delete these items? This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you wish to delete these items? This cannot be undone.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to clear your playlist?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to clear your playlist?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you wish to unpin this tile?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you wish to unpin this tile?

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Media Browser for Windows Phone. This app will allow you to browse your media collection, stream it to your phone and remotely control any of the controllable Media Browser clients.
trans-unit.target: Welcome to Media Browser for Windows Phone. This app will allow you to browse your media collection, stream it to your phone and remotely control any of the controllable Media Browser clients.

trans-unit.source: To show off some of the great artwork available for the media you have, the tile will use some of that artwork, here you can choose how that tile will look
trans-unit.target: To show off some of the great artwork available for the media you have, the tile will use some of that artwork, here you can choose how that tile will look

trans-unit.source: Make us the lock screen provider
trans-unit.target: Make us the lock screen provider

trans-unit.source: Just show the list of items, not a media folder view
trans-unit.target: Just show the list of items, not a media folder view

trans-unit.source: Media Browser is not the lock screen provider
trans-unit.target: Media Browser is not the lock screen provider

trans-unit.source: Media Browser is the current lock screen provider
trans-unit.target: Media Browser is the current lock screen provider

trans-unit.source: Enable enhanced images (if installed on the server)
trans-unit.target: Enable enhanced images (if installed on the server)

trans-unit.source: Before we can get started though, you need to make sure you're running the Media Browser server.
trans-unit.target: Before we can get started though, you need to make sure you're running the Media Browser server.

trans-unit.source: If you're happy with what you've configured, click the settings button and enter your server's details, else you can just quit the app from here.
trans-unit.target: If you're happy with what you've configured, click the settings button and enter your server's details, else you can just quit the app from here.

trans-unit.source: Once the Media Browser server is configured, make sure it's accessible from where you are, whether that's being on your local wireless network, or an external static address.
trans-unit.target: Once the Media Browser server is configured, make sure it's accessible from where you are, whether that's being on your local wireless network, or an external static address.

trans-unit.source: Display random backdrop images on the back of the tile
trans-unit.target: Display random backdrop images on the back of the tile

trans-unit.source: WARNING: Changing the hostname will remove any saved profiles.
trans-unit.target: WARNING: Changing the hostname will remove any saved profiles.

trans-unit.source: Put the connection details in to point to the computer running Media Browser 3. Then simply test them to confirm.
trans-unit.target: Put the connection details in to point to the computer running Media Browser 3. Then simply test them to confirm.

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Media Browser for Windows Phone. This app will allow you to browse your media collection and remotely control any of the controllable Media Browser clients.
trans-unit.target: Welcome to Media Browser for Windows Phone. This app will allow you to browse your media collection and remotely control any of the controllable Media Browser clients.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel this recording? This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to cancel this recording? This cannot be undone.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel this series link? This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to cancel this series link? This cannot be undone.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was an error cancelling this series at this time.
trans-unit.target: Sorry, there was an error canceling this series at this time.

trans-unit.source: Pre-padding is required in order to record
trans-unit.target: Pre-padding is required in order to record

trans-unit.note: Pre-padding = how long before programme's scheduled start time to record

trans-unit.source: Post-padding is required in order to record
trans-unit.target: Post-padding is required in order to record

trans-unit.note: {0} is the name of the tv show

trans-unit.source: In trial mode you can only play one video per day. Please try this tomorrow or purchase the full version.
trans-unit.target: In trial mode you can only play one video per day. Please try this tomorrow or purchase the full version.
